text: Kendall Francois (July 26, 1971 - September 11, 2014) was an American serial killer. Francois was born in Poughkeepsie, New York. He killed eight female prostitutes between October 1996 and August 1998 in Poughkeepsie, New York. He would strangle his victims and hide their dead bodies inside his home. The victims were aged between 25 and 51. For these crimes, he was sentenced to life imprisonment without the possibility of parole on August 11, 2000. He served his jail time at the Wende Correctional Facility in Alden, New York. Francois died from apparent natural causes on September 11, 2014 at the Wende Correctional Facility, aged 43. ==References== ==Other websites== * Kendall Francois at Murderpedia * Kendall Francois at Criminal Library Category:1971 births Category:2014 deaths Category:African-American people Category:American prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment Category:American serial killers Category:Criminals from New York (state) Category:People who died in prison custody Category:People with HIV/AIDS Category:People from Poughkeepsie, New York
title: Kendall Francois
